UpdateLog.description:
<title>Hot Fix</title><font>Small</font> - Fixed bug where propeller animation class would finish prematurely.
- Fixed bug where PostToSettings fields with disable conditions would disable regardless if dependencies were active or not.
- Fixed issue where pawns were unable to load cargo to vehicle.
- Fixed compatibility issue with Biotech where mechanitors were unable to repair vehicles.
- Fixed issue where VF mod version number would use player's local time instead of the project build date. <title>Final Notes</title><font>Tiny</font> Please report any issues you find on the<link>https://discord.gg/zXDyfWQ</link>(discord server).
